attributes.action: Predict GCSE and A-Level Grades as if the COVID-19 pandemic had never existed
attributes.additional_details:
Teachers and exam boards should be judging grades from where they believe students would have been if the pandemic had never existed. If the government continues with the path they are on, this is unfair for this year compared to the last, and previous years.
Teachers and many other students agree that this years system is unfair, and should be changed.
This isn't a number. It's our future.
attributes.background: This years GCSE and A-Level results will be judged from where our teachers and exam boards believe we stand currently. This is unfair with the +7months students have had of poorer quality of learning.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579284
